label: Householder Planning Consent
description: For extensions, alterations or improvements to residential properties

label: Full Planning Consent
description: For detailed planning permission with all matters specified

label: Outline Planning Consent
description: For planning permission in principle with some matters reserved

label: Reserved Matters
description: For approval of details following outline planning permission

label: Listed Building Consent
description: For alterations to listed buildings

label: Advertisement Consent
description: For displaying advertisements and signs

label: Lawful Development Certificate (LDC)
description: To confirm whether development is lawful

label: Prior Approval
description: For permitted development requiring prior approval

label: Removal/Variation of Conditions
description: To remove or modify planning conditions

label: Approval (Discharge) of Conditions
description: To discharge planning conditions

label: Consent under Tree Preservation Orders
description: For work on protected trees

label: Non-material Amendment
description: For minor changes to existing planning permission

label: Application for Permission in Principle
description: For permission in principle on minor development

label: Certificate of Lawfulness of Proposed Works to Listed Building
description: To confirm lawfulness of proposed listed building works

label: Planning Application for Onshore Oil and Gas Extraction
description: For onshore extraction of oil and gas

label: Prior Approval for Temporary Recreational Campsite in Flood Zone
description: For temporary campsites in Flood Zone 2 or 3

label: Hybrid Application
description: Combined outline and full planning permission for different parts of same site

label: Modification of Construction Working Hours Conditions
description: To modify conditions relating to construction working hours

label: Additional Environmental Approval to Extend Duration
description: To extend the duration of a planning permission with environmental approval

label: Planning Permission for Mineral Extraction
description: For mineral extraction or associated development

label: Modification or Discharge of Section 106 Planning Obligation
description: To modify or discharge Section 106 agreements

label: Prior Approval for Toll Road Facilities
description: For toll road facilities (Part 9 - Class D)

label: Prior Approval for Mining and Mineral Exploration
description: For mining and mineral exploration (Part 17 â€“ Class B, C, D, F, G)

label: Prior Approval for Miscellaneous Development
description: For miscellaneous development (Part 18 - Class A)

label: Certificate of Appropriate Alternative Development
description: For certificates of appropriate alternative development
